description:
An introduction to the social, political and historical institutions of France from the earliest times until the Revolution of 1789. Required for majors in French and also of particular interest to majors in history, international relations, Wharton students, etc. 

This course will be taught in French.
name: French History Seen Through the Prism of Tours: Penn-in-Tours

section.name: French History Seen Through the Prism of Tours: Penn-in-Tours
